title: NASA Provides Update to Astronaut Moon Lander Plans Under Artemis
summary: As NASA makes strides to return humans to the lunar surface under Artemis, the agency announced plans Wednesday to create additional opportunities for commercial companies to develop an astronaut Moon lander.

title: Hispasat buys teleport operator to expand managed services business
summary: Spanish satellite operator Hispasat is open to more acquisitions that vertically integrate its business after buying managed services provider AXESS Networks, according to its CEO Miguel Panduro.

title: Satellite supplier with in-house production bid the lowest price for DoD constellation
summary: Frank Turner, technical director of the Space Development Agency, said companies that manufacture their own satellites buses are bidding much lower prices than those that don't

title: Vulcan Centaur on schedule for first launch in 2022 as New Glenn slips
summary: United Launch Alliance remains confident that its Vulcan Centaur rocket will make its first launch this year while Blue Origin is pushing back the first flight of its New Glenn vehicle.

title: NASA to Host Axiom Mission 1 Flight Readiness Media Teleconference
summary: NASA will host a media teleconference Friday, March 25, following the agency’s flight readiness review for the Axiom Mission 1 (Ax-1), the first private astronaut mission to the International Space Station.

title: SES beat multiple bidders for Leonardo DRS satcom business
summary: Leonardo DRS sold its satellite communications business to SES for $450 million after considering bids from several interested buyers.

title: Ukrainian launch startup Promin juggles research, territorial defense
summary: During the day, they are working on the Kyiv-headquartered startup’s lightweight solid-fuel rocket. But after hours, Promin Aerospace employees volunteer to protect their homes and families as territorial defense members and humanitarian aid coordinators.

title: Watch live: Spacewalk underway for space station maintenance, upgrades
summary: Two astronauts floated outside the International Space Station Wednesday for a spacewalk to install refurbished ammonia jumpers in the lab’s cooling system, to replace a high-definition camera and to make power and data connections on a European instrument platform.

title: Boeing eyes investment candidates at Satellite 2022
summary: Boeing executives are meeting with startups at the Satellite 2022 conference with an eye toward investment and collaboration.

title: Universal connectivity requires extensive collaboration
summary: Within a decade, satellite mobility providers expect to offer customers a seamless transitions between terrestrial and satellite networks.
